articles.description: Thousands of music fans are making their way there, and with that comes the challenge of navigating road closures and parking. But a local dad is making the most of it.
articles.content:
WEST CHESTER, Ohio —Countrys biggest stars took the stage in West Chester Thursday night for the Voices of America Country Music Fest.
